duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Construction PM team in all aspects of project life cycle from design to closeout.
Support design review and provide document management verification for projects in the closeout phase.
Assist in contract management by staying on top of expiration dates, funding, and deliverables.
Travel to job sites and provide project support for large compressor station upgrades, equipment upgrades, fuel changes, control changes, exhaust changes, and installations of SCADA systems/controls.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Engineering or related field
